title: Leonardo Kamogawa's website
text:
About









Blog





No matching items



Background pattern made by Joost van der Schee

LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github
  
  
    
     Email
  
  
    
     Hyperpyrus
  

  
  
I am a Data Scientist with a background in mathematics and senior experience in auditing at a Big Four accounting firm.
Currently, I work as a Data Scientist in the logistics industry. I primarily build interactive R Shiny dashboards with real-time geospatial visualizations, develop automated reporting pipelines using Quarto, and apply machine learning and computer vision models to detect risky driving behaviors.
Also, I am available for freelance jobs related to R Shiny, data science and machine learning.
For a more detailed view of my work experience, you can take a look at my English CV or my Portuguese CV.
If you have any questions or want to hire my services, mail me! I will be glad to help.

About me
After telling you what I do, maybe you want to know who I am!
If so, check my digital garden: Hyperpyrus. There you will find my notes and thoughts about almost everything and read about The Life and Opinions of Leonardo Kamogawa, Gentleman.

About this website
This website has two purposes: to showcase my professional abilities (selfish) and to share useful knowledge to everyone (altruistic).
Despite the antithesis, I think that these two reasons are good enough to start a professional blog. And I recommend you to start one too!

title: Licenses
text:
Except where otherwise noted, content on this site is licensed under a CC BY-SA 4.0 License.   

Static Site Generator
This website was made with Quarto v.1.8.26. Quarto v.1.4 (and later) is licensed under the MIT License.
More information in Quarto License page.


Vector and icons
The Hanko stamp used as logo of this website was made with HankoPress service. Terms of Use can be found in this link.
The pattern on top and bottom of my digital business card was designed using Pi SVG Vector by Stephenhutchings in PD License via SVG Repo.
The background pattern used in the Home Page was made by Joost van der Schee.


Fonts
The serif font family used is Charter. Here is the link to the page where the file and the original license can be accessed due to Matthew Butterick efforts.
The sans-serif font family used is CooperHewitt by Cooper Hewitt Smithsonian Design Museum, and is licensed under the SIL Open Font License.
The monospace font family used is mononoki by Matthias Tellen, and is licensed under the SIL Open Font License.


Color Palette
The color palette used in this website was based on Flexoki color scheme.
Flexoki was made by Steph Ango, and is licensed under the MIT License.
